verses.verse: The <S%G976>book<s%> of the <S%G1078>genealogy<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1138>David,<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham.<s%>

<S%G11>Abraham<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G2464>Isaac.<s%> <S%G2464>Isaac<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G2384>Jacob.<s%> <S%G2384>Jacob<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G2455>Judah<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brothers.<s%>

<S%G2455>Judah<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5329>Perez<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1537>Zerah<s%> by <S%G2283>Tamar.<s%> <S%G5329>Perez<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G2074>Hezron.<s%> <S%G2074>Hezron<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G689>Ram.<s%>

<S%G689>Ram<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G284>Amminadab.<s%> <S%G284>Amminadab<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G3476>Nahshon.<s%> <S%G3476>Nahshon<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G4533>Salmon.<s%>

<S%G4533>Salmon<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G1003>Boaz<s%> by <S%G4477>Rahab.<s%> <S%G1003>Boaz<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5601>Obed<s%> by <S%G4503>Ruth.<s%> <S%G5601>Obed<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G2421>Jesse.<s%>

<S%G2421>Jesse<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G935>King<s%> <S%G1138>David.<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4672>Solomon<s%> by <S%G3588>her<s%> who had been the wife of <S%G3774>Uriah.<s%>

<S%G4672>Solomon<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G4497>Rehoboam.<s%> <S%G4497>Rehoboam<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G7>Abijah.<s%> <S%G7>Abijah<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G760>Asa.<s%>

<S%G760>Asa<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G2498>Jehoshaphat.<s%> <S%G2498>Jehoshaphat<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G2496>Joram.<s%> <S%G2496>Joram<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G3604>Uzziah.<s%>

<S%G3604>Uzziah<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G2488>Jotham.<s%> <S%G1161>Jotham<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G881>Ahaz.<s%> <S%G881>Ahaz<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G1478>Hezekiah.<s%>

<S%G1478>Hezekiah<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G3128>Manasseh.<s%> <S%G3128>Manasseh<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G300>Amon.<s%> <S%G300>Amon<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G2502>Josiah.<s%>

<S%G2502>Josiah<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G2423>Jechoniah<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> his <S%G80>brothers,<s%> at the <S%G1909>time<s%> of <S%G846>the<s%> exile <S%G3350>to<s%> <S%G897>Babylon.<s%>

<S%G3326>After<s%> the exile <S%G3350>to<s%> <S%G897>Babylon,<s%> <S%G2423>Jechoniah<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G4528>Shealtiel.<s%> <S%G4528>Shealtiel<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G2216>Zerubbabel.<s%>

<S%G2216>Zerubbabel<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G10>Abiud.<s%> <S%G10>Abiud<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G1662>Eliakim.<s%> <S%G1662>Eliakim<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G107>Azor.<s%>

<S%G107>Azor<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G4524>Sadoc.<s%> <S%G4524>Sadoc<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G885>Achim.<s%> <S%G885>Achim<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G1664>Eliud.<s%>

<S%G1664>Eliud<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G1648>Eleazar.<s%> <S%G1648>Eleazar<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G3157>Matthan.<s%> <S%G3157>Matthan<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G2384>Jacob.<s%>

<S%G2384>Jacob<s%> became the <S%G1080>father<s%> of <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> the <S%G435>husband<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3137>Mary,<s%> from <S%G3739>whom<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> who is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G3767>So<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1074>generations<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> are <S%G1180>fourteen<s%> <S%G1074>generations;<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> the exile <S%G3350>to<s%> <S%G897>Babylon<s%> <S%G1180>fourteen<s%> <S%G1074>generations;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the carrying away <S%G3350>to<s%> <S%G897>Babylon<s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G1180>fourteen<s%> <S%G1074>generations.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G1083>birth<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> like <S%G3779>this;<s%> for <S%G1063>after<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G3137>Mary,<s%> was <S%G1064>engaged<s%> to <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> <S%G4250>before<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> came <S%G4905>together,<s%> she <S%G2192>was<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> pregnant by <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

<S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G435>husband,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> a <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G2532>man,<s%> and <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2309>willing<s%> to <S%G3856>make<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> a public <S%G3856>example,<s%> <S%G1014>intended<s%> to <S%G630>put<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G630>away<s%> <S%G2977>secretly.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1760>when<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> thought <S%G1760>about<s%> these <S%G5023>things,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5316>appeared<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> a <S%G3677>dream,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2501>"Joseph,<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1138>David,<s%> <S%G3361>don't<s%> be <S%G5399>afraid<s%> to take to <S%G3880>yourself<s%> <S%G3137>Mary,<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> for <S%G1063>that<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1080>conceived<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

<S%G1161>She<s%> shall bring <S%G5088>forth<s%> a <S%G5207>son.<s%> <S%G2532>You<s%> shall <S%G2564>call<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> it is <S%G846>he<s%> who shall <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G266>sins.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> has <S%G1096>happened,<s%> that <S%G2443>it<s%> might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

<S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> the <S%G3933>virgin<s%> shall <S%G2192>be<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G1064>child,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> shall bring <S%G5088>forth<s%> a <S%G5207>son.<s%> <S%G2532>They<s%> shall <S%G2564>call<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1694>Immanuel;<s%>" <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is,<s%> being <S%G3177>interpreted,<s%> <S%G2316>"God<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2257>us.<s%>"

<S%G2501>Joseph<s%> <S%G1326>arose<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> his <S%G5258>sleep,<s%> and <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4367>commanded<s%> <S%G3880>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> took <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%> to <S%G3880>himself;<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> sexually until she had brought <S%G5088>forth<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G4416>firstborn<s%> <S%G5207>son.<s%> He <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G2564>him<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
